title: Cute, girly round-toe and lace shoes are totally in
text:
| Updated: Aug 19, 2015 16:21 IST 
You can’t buy ­happiness but you can buy shoes and that’s kind of the same thing,” once said a wise woman, and today most ladies would swear by this truth. With discounts and sales encouraging you to shoe shop your heart out, we let you in on the next big show trend —round-toe, lace shoes — known for their cute, girly appeal. 
These pairs are emerging again as the hot footwear choice of fashion-forward celebrities. From Alia Bhatt to Katrina Kaif, Bollywood divas tip-toed in style at their recent ­outings in round-toe shoes. Whether you pick up block-heeled beauties or ­glittery platforms, there’s always a way to make a ­statement. Check out some stylish pairs adorned by our glam brigade. We also tell you how to wear them right. 
Print game Want to introduce some flirt and fun to your look? Wear a painted pair of sneakers, like actor Richa Chadha. 
Blingy beauties Heading to a party? Invest in a blingy pair with platform heels, like the one gracing actor Shruti Haasan’s feet. 
Dual tone Actor Alia Bhatt peps up her casual black tee and denims combo with a pair of black and white lace-up shoes. 
Colour bomb Add colour to your look with a peppy pair of shoes in reds, ­yellows or pinks, like actor Sonam Kapoor. 
Sporty spirit Keeping her look simple and classic, actor Katrina Kaif opts for sporty canvas shoes. It’s time to relive your sporty days. Tags
